channel.title: Watched
channel.description: Why are there so many people Watched on the forums right now.

item.title: Watched
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Basically as Soulcist said, people can’t/don’t want to follow the rules. Though, most of the time even that isn’t that big of a deal. It’s people who purposely spam, flame, or troll people we particularly go after. There’s no good reason for trolling. It’s just fucking with someone to have a good time, which is completely unproductive for the community. Continual trolling will always lead to a ban in this community.

Anyway, this topic is probably going to cause problems, so I’m gonna go ahead and lock it now that the question has been answered.

Read full topic

item.title: Watched

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Because people don’t know how to follow simple rules.
